Name: Master of Disguises
Text: On Play: Transform a random card in your hand into another random card

Name: Persistent Troll
Text: On Play: Add a copy of this card to your hand

Name: Last Laugh Larry
Text: On Play: Discard a random card in your hand

Name: Twins
Text: On Pickup: Add a copy of this card to your hand

Name: Ultimatum Ulrich
Text: On Pickup: Discard a random card from your hand

Name: Wannabe Wizard
Text: On Pickup: Transform a random card in your hand into another random card

Name: Never-ending Nathan
Text: On Pickup: Shuffle a copy of this card into the global deck

Name: Shaky Sorceror
Text: On Play: Transform a random card in the global deck into another random card

Name: The King
Text: On Play: Transform a random copy of this card in the global deck into another random card

Name: Neglected Shapeshifter
Text: On Swipe: Transform this card into another random card

Name: Jealous Jane
Text: On Swipe: Discard a random card from your hand

Name: Wicked Witch
Text: On Swipe: Transform a random card in your hand into another random card

Name: Vengeful Vicky
Text: On Swipe: Add a copy of this card to your hand

Name: Gracious Gamer
Text: On Play: If your hand contains no duplicates, transform every card in your hand into another random card

Name: Harry the Hoarder
Text: On Swipe: Shuffle a copy of your hand into the global deck

Name: Jim'll Fix It
Text: On Pickup: Add three random cards to the bottom of the global deck

Name: Double Trouble Lyle
Text: On Pickup: If your hand contains no duplicates, add a copy of this card to your hand

Name: Shady Dealer
Text: On Play: Add a random card to your hand

Name: The Professor
Text: On Discard: Transform every card in your hand into another random card

Name: Nathan's Big Brother
Text: On Play: Shuffle a copy of this card into the global deck

Name: Postcard
Text: On Swipe: Add a random card to your hand

Name: Garry the Ghoul
Text: On Discard: Shuffle a copy of this card into the global deck

Name: Mysterious Phoenix
Text: On Discard: Shuffle a random card into the global deck

Name: Shiro the Sumo
Text: On Discard: Add random cards to your hand until your hand is full

Name: Silly Sally
Text: On Discard: Transform a random card in your hand into another random card

Name: Pandemonium
Text: On Swipe: Discard another random card in your hand and add a copy of this card to your hand

Name: Reload
Text: On Play: Discard another random card in your hand and add a random card to your hand

Name: Alice the Alien
Text: On Discard: Duplicate a random card in your hand

Name: Spotlight Suzie
Text: On Swipe: Discard any duplicate cards in your hand

Name: Goody Two Shoes Gwen
Text: On Swipe: Add a random card to the global deck for each unique card in your hand
